::Slaughter::

     Slaughter came to the Dark Avian, and was standing a di=
stance away from it, but could see it perfectly.  He was getting very hungr=
y, the trees and little animals he ate on the way did not satisfy him, he c=
raved to eat food that fought back!  Slaughter moved in, closer to the Dece=
pticon base.  He looked around, seeing if there were any bots outside.  Sli=
me dripped from his body, and his mouth was getting watery with hunger.  Sl=
ime mixed in with saliva, and he was super hungry, and was getting weak, an=
d he urged to kill something with his pincirs and chew it up.  And then, fo=
r no reason, Slaughter just let out a loud roar.

OOC: Ok, I need to know w=
hat bots are at the Stunticon base, and if they are outside or inside and i=
n what rooms, and all that, I need to know where they are if they are at th=
e Dark Avian.
